DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this research study is to test a program developed to help patients with chronic heart or lung problems take care of themselves and cope with their illness or limitations.
DOC.brief_title: Combined Illness Management and Psychotherapy in Treating Depressed Elders
DOC.criteria: Age 55 years or older Diagnosis of Heart Failure or COPD Depressive symptoms indicated by a BDIII score of 10 or higher Functional impairment Current psychotherapy Cognitive Impairment Psychiatric diagnosis Active suicidal thoughts Significant vision or hearing impairment Residence in long term care facility
